column5: As an engineering student you work in groups, collaborate with companies on projects, and you will be in high demand on the labour market.This study programme is relevant for you if you already have a bachelor degree in Chemical Engineering and Biotechnology and you want to enhance your skills.With a MSc in Chemical Engineering and Biotechnology you can work in the production of phytopharmacology, food products, medicines, clean energy, process development or biorefineries. You will also be qualified for consultancy work and project management in chemical, environmental and biotechnological industries.  Learn more from the students
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
